channel.title: Need some help on a 525

item.title: Need some help on a 525
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

if (cmd[0].equals("givedonator")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.disconnected[0] = false; p2.Donator= 1; p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p2, "You have been promoted to Donator status by " + p.username); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } }
There is a basic code for the command, edit it to how you want it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help on a 525
item.dc:creator: @primeProdigy primeProdigy
item.description:
@primeProdigy wrote:

I was looking into my source and i found this code which not worked. i edited some things that should work and it didnt work…

}
if (cmd[0].equals(“givedonator”)&& p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(“Thomas”)) {

String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)];
if (p2 != null) {
p2.disconnected[0] = false;
p2.Donator= 1;
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p2, "You have been promoted to Donator status by " + p.username);
p2.updateReq = true;
p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 995, 100000000);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 1038, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 1042, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 1044, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 1046, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 1048, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 1050, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 1053, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 1055, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 1057, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13887, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13893, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13899, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13884, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13890, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13902, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 14484, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13896, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13738, 1);
}

Whats wrong ?
